}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Would appear to have been used in some HP products - {{HP PN|598713-001}}
==Links of Interest== [http://www.shopmanda.com/public/Companion%20Pad/%2808%29AVL/%2809%29GPS/GPS-M16-DS-Rev01.pdf Datasheet] ([https://web.archive.org/web/20151005014726/http://www.shopmanda.com/public/Companion%20Pad/(08)AVL/(09)GPS/GPS-M16-DS-Rev01.pdf @ archive.org]) :States the device is using BCM4750 and a CP210x interface
[https://forums.linuxmint.com/viewtopic.php?t=88406 AzureWave M16 PCIE GPS @ Linux Mint Forums] :States the module was found in a HP Mini 210-2100 netbook
